comments.message: Wherw
Hi macs Singapore, I managed to collect 004,005,006. This means for sure I will automatically get a $5 value meal voucher rite. I don't have to fill in other info rite? Thanks..

HI, Macdonald's Mgt, wanted to redeem the $5 Extra Value Meal coupon. However, when I tried to redeem it, the cashier (Fajar branch) informed me that the promo was that I had to buy a set meal and I would receive a fillet o'fish burger free. I said the app indicated a free $5 voucher. After she went to ask the manager, the manager informed me that the promo app was that a normal meal of $5.50 would now cost $5, and there would be no free burger, and i would have to pay additional $2 for the burger. I can't wait and argue with the staff after 15 mins, I have another appointment. So I pay up and left first, i still have all the receipts. I have already lodged a complaint and sent an email to the accordingly. Why set up this app redemption system if your employees knows absolutely nothing about it and tries to misled its customers? Is it a new form of cheating others?

Hi McDonald's management, I want to highlight my unhappy experience today while trying to claim this free $5 Extra Value Meal food coupon. 

It seems to me that the staffs and managers at the outlet I went to do not know what this food coupon and promotion is. They kept telling me that it is not free and that I have to pay $5 for the meal and then only do I get a free burger. This is clearly not what the promotion is.

After trying to explain to them for quite awhile what this food coupon and promotion is, I was then ignored by them and they proceeded to do their stuffs. I tried to ask them to give the management or marketing department a call to clarify this promotion but none bothered to do so.

It was only after awhile that I managed to get hold of one of the staff to read McDonald's facebook post then was I allowed to redeem the free $5 Extra Value Meal food coupon and it was done reluctantly.

Could you please educate all your staffs at the outlets what this food coupon and promotion is so that others will not experience what I went through.

Hi McDonald's management, I would like to suggest you that your website and app need to be updated. My new location at Yishun street 51 is not updated in the Mac Donald location..I'm deaf. I cannot call for Mac D delivery. I'm waiting for this update since March .

comments.message:
Kindly serve your tata on the beverage cap. My family have been receiving this for more than 20 years, until recently your staff stop doing so. This is a unique Singapore culture where diners dip their fries on tata-sauce and I expect this to be carry on. It's not difficult, just the sauce. Stop changing consumer's dinning behaviour and stop charging for those sauce which are suppose to be serve. This is Singapore, not Australia. Stop bringing foreign culture into Singapore McDonald.
If Singapore McDonald aren't hearing me and not doing so, my families gona visit your rivals soon. Thank you.

Dated 19 May 2015, A mcdelivery order was placed an outlet from Pasir ris Elias Mall. at 12:30AM for a grilled chicken salad EVM. Order was supposed to reach at 1:15am but instead it reached late, (nevermind shan't nitpick the extra minutes spent waiting at the door, reason being didnt want the deliveryman to ring the doorbell and wake the whole entire family up) To my dismay, there was no utensils included, (that's tolerable since we can always use our own.) But there was no salad dressing as well. Well I'm pretty sure McDonald's promotes healthy eating, but not asking your customers to eat like cows(really? maybe there's no such intention im sure of it) We need utensils and to be honest, the salad is dry without its sauce. Made a call to enquire and the CS says to get branch manager to call back, well it didnt happen. And guess what, (thinking you guys are pretty efficient, sent another guy in about 15 mins to deliver the sauce. He sure did his job well by making sure he rang the doorbell and knocked (loud enough) Well i think that defeat the whole purpose. Thanks for ruining the meal, good job for creating a nuisance and fabulous customer service.
Looks great but delivery service sucks!!! Food arrived after more than one hour and it is cold!!!

The producers of this sappy video are calculative. Here we have a young child thanking her mother and telling her mother "thank you and I love you". Interestingly it is usually the domestic helper that looks after young children. This ads shows no idea that the mother looks after the child. The little girl goes to the domestic helper and thanks the helper as well but stops short of saying "I love you". THAT is calculative. 99.9% of children have no problem thanking who ever for takng care of them as THAT is the true sign of caring commitment and love. However maybe the mother put away her shopping parcels, changed out of her glamor clothes and engaged in "caring" for her daughter.
So touch...happy mother's day to all mother's   :-) :-) <3

bring back year 07 fantastic rice burger T_T.... ckn/beef fantastic... rice burger with mean patty and purple cabage..

Okay a review of this burger. First thing first the bun is just like any other normal burger buns. Tastes normal nothing special. The cheese is as advertised. Very big slice and has a special taste to it which I like. Not the normal cheese you get in the filet-o-fish. Next up is the grilled chicken thigh patty. It's the same one in the salad. Except that it has an added spicy kick to it like mcspicy. And then it's topped with sautéed sweet onion which gives it a bit of sweetness to neutralise the saltiness. Overall it's quite an awesome burger that I think should stay permanently in their menu.

Dear Mcdonald's, thank you for writing in. You might be aware that for the past few months, ports in the West Coast of the US have been faced with a series of issues leading to congestion and disruption of cargo which in turn affected our supply of condiments and sauces. We’ve worked on getting our supplies back and we’re happy to let you know that we may have curry sauce back in our stores by mid-year. We appreciate your patience and understanding on this. Thank you.

19.post_text:
Calling all spice lovers! Prepare to be delighted with McDonald’s new Spiced Butter Teppanyaki Burger. 

Featuring a harmonious blend of spices comprising capsicum, black pepper, ginger, garlic and onions, the delightfully hot Spiced Butter Teppanyaki Sauce adds sizzle to the burger’s combination of a grilled skinless chicken patty, grilled onions and creamy cheese, served between toasted black and white sesame buns.

Available from today in restaurants islandwide, for a limited time only.

Dear customers, we will be performing scheduled maintenance for our McDelivery system and will not be able to accept any McDelivery orders on 22 April 2015, from 4am to 5am.

We apologise for any inconvenience caused and we appreciate your patience as we work to serve you better.
